column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A truck and car collision caused serious injuries at 12.10 am on Tuesday
column6: along National Road 1 in Veal Sbov commune
column9: a Camry was driving along National Road 1 and was turning off the road when it was hit by a green Hyundai truck. An unknown number of people inside the car suffered serious injuries and  were transported to the hospital immediately. The truck driver managed to slip away from the scene.------Authorities arrived at the scene and took the two vehicles to be kept at Phnom Penh Land Traffic Office to resolve the matter. More images: ------NKD
